info.title: PatchMon REST API
info.description: PatchMon API documentation. For scoped credentials API documentation, see: https://docs.patchmon.net/books/patchmon-application-documentation/page/integration-api-documentation

basicAuth.description: Basic Authentication using API credentials (token_key:token_secret). Used for scoped API endpoints under /api/v1/api/*

bearerAuth.name: Authorization
bearerAuth.description: JWT Bearer token authentication. Format: 'Bearer <token>'. Used for dashboard endpoints.
